author: craigmcc
msg: Apply the same patch to the "test" connector.

author: craigmcc
msg: Generalize the lookup of all the host addresses for our server.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the class names for the default authenticators for Catalina.

author: craigmcc
msg: Make the deployment objects for <ejb-ref>, <env-entry>, and
<resource-ref> elements into standard JavaBeans, and add appropriate
toString() methods.  Remove reliance (in ContextConfig) on methods that
are implemented in StandardContext() but not in the Context() interface.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add support for storing the configuration elements <filter> and
<filter-mapping> from the web application deployment descriptor, and
improve the handling of the <env-entry> element.
There is no functional support for filters yet, but recording the
configuration is the first step in that direction.
